title: Rename terminallogger docs and update with more details
body:
### Context
These in-repo docs for TerminalLogger are likely to be hit when searching, so they need to be up to date and referring to the latest names.

### Changes Made

Changed the folder name to reflect the name of the feature.
Reworked the doc content to be more descriptive and targeted at the end-user persepective.

commit.message: Rename terminallogger docs and update with more details
